channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Apple confirms plans to build some new Macs in the United States in 2026 — but will this translate to lower prices at last?
item.description: Apple will start US-based Mac mini production in Houston, expanding domestic manufacturing while balancing costs, regional demand, and global supply.

item.title: Claude is the Number 2 Free App in Apple’s App Store Now
item.description: Has Donald Trump brought about Claudemania?

item.title: X Is Drowning in Disinformation Following US and Israel’s Attack on Iran
item.description: WIRED has reviewed hundreds of posts on X that promote misleading claims about the locations and scale of the attack.

item.title: Why did Netflix back down from its deal to acquire Warner Bros.?
item.description: Netflix's co-CEO reportedly told Trump, "I took your advice."

item.title: Knights vs Cowboys Live Streams: How to watch NRL 2026 for FREE from anywhere in the world
item.description: As the Knights vs Cowboys from Las Vegas to kick off the season, here's how to watch NRL 2026 live streams with TV channels and FREE options explained.

item.title: Wispr Flow is the dictation upgrade Android users deserve
item.description: This new Android app makes voice input easier and more accurate than ever—even compared with other top options. Gee whiz, Gboard: You’re really falling behind.

item.title: Iran attack: Flights canceled and diverted across the Middle East amid U.S. and Israel military operation
item.description: Israel, Qatar, Syria, Iran, Iraq, Kuwait, and Bahrain closed their airspace, with major airlines warning passengers to prepare for widespread disruptions. The U.S. and Israel’s attack on Iran led to commercial flights disruption on Saturday across the Middle East and beyond as regional airspaces began closing and tens of thousands of travelers around the globe were stranded....

item.title: 3 conversation-killers to avoid at work
item.description: In a fast-moving world, our communication is at risk of becoming impatient and transactional. Here’s how to remake it. In today’s world, the villain in our story isn’t a person; it’s our desire for instant gratification. Explosive sales growth? We want it now. An dream angel investor? We want it now. A raise, a promotion, a spot at the top? We want it now. ...

item.title: I'm a robot vacuum expert, and these are the 8 biggest misconceptions people have
item.description: Robot vacuums are getting a bad rap — let me set the record straight.

item.title: What to know about the landmark Warner Bros. Discovery sale
item.description: Learn more about Paramount's planned acquisition of Warner Bros. Discovery — a historic Hollywood megadeal valued at $111 billion — as it continues to develop.
